mapper.update:
update o_distribution_goods
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_free = #{isFree,jdbcType=INTEGER},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
relate_goods_id = #{relateGoodsId},
category_code = #{categoryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel_rate = #{channelRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
paid_amount = #{paidAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
paid_total_money = #{paidTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
on_time = #{onTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
center_type = #{centerType},
refer_distribution_goods_id = #{referDistributionGoodsId},
refer_branch_id = #{referBranchId},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
saas_id = #{saasId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refer_branch_name = #{referBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
